attributes.action: homework for primary and secondary schools be optional.
attributes.additional_details: pupils have enough stress of day to day life and struggles they go through and home should be a safe place and a relaxed place without homework. it’s caused way to much stress for kids from key stage 3-5.
attributes.background: We want the Government to stop homework. We think it’s best for pupils and 6 hours and 5 days a week is enough to learn what is needed. homework should be optional, it should be up to the child or teenager if they want to take extra work home.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573179
